issue.title: [C++] Compute aggregate compression ratio when producing compressed IPC body messages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8823](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8823). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be beneficial to know the exact bytes-on-wire savings once the message has been produced. Since this computation would be relatively trivial it would not add overhead to the IPC write hot path.
